value: `on` if you want to see debug messages `off` if not
Verified domain email address that will be used to send emails for example admin@<your-domain-name>.
Your password do django admin console.
Empty string if you be using OKta else domain from created in Auth0 `SINGLE PAGE APPLICATION`
Empty string if you be using OKta else client ID from created in Auth0 `SINGLE PAGE APPLICATION`
Empty string if you be using OKta else client Secret from created in Auth0 `SINGLE PAGE APPLICATION`
Empty string if you be using OKta else domain from created in Auth0 `MACHINE TO MACHINE`
Empty string if you be using OKta else client ID from created in Auth0 `MACHINE TO MACHINE`

Empty string if you be using Auth0 else set here client key from web app created in Okta.`
Empty string if you be using Auth0 else set here client secret from web app created in Okta.
Empty string if you be using Auth0 else set here domain url to your Okta instance, for example `https://dev-7777777.okta.com`.
Empty string if you be using Auth0 else set here created API token to your instance.
